webwork-tex.statement: Determine whether each of the following vector fields \(\vec{F}\) is path independent (conservative) or not. If it is path independent, enter a potential function for it, that is, a function \(f(x,y)\) so that \(\nabla f = \vec{F}\). If it is path dependent, enter {\it NONE.} \leavevmode\\\relax \leavevmode\\\relax (a) If \(\vec{F}(x,y) = (x + 5) \vec{i} + (6 y + 2) \vec{j}\), then \leavevmode\\\relax \(f(x,y)\) = \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}} \leavevmode\\\relax \leavevmode\\\relax (b) If \(\vec{F}(x,y) = (6 x + 5 y)\vec{i} + (5 x + 5 y)\vec{j}\), then \leavevmode\\\relax \(f(x,y)\) = \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}} \leavevmode\\\relax \leavevmode\\\relax (c) If \(\vec{F}(x,y) = \langle -3 y, 3x \rangle\), then \leavevmode\\\relax \(f(x,y)\) = \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}} \leavevmode\\\relax \leavevmode\\\relax (d) If \(\vec{F}(x,y) = \langle 3 x^2 - y^2, -2xy \rangle\), then \leavevmode\\\relax \(f(x,y)\) = \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}} \leavevmode\\\relax \leavevmode\\\relax (e) If \(\vec{F}(x,y) = \displaystyle \frac{2 y}{x+5} \vec{i} + 2 \ln(x+5) \vec{j}\), then \leavevmode\\\relax \(f(x,y)\) = \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}} \leavevmode\\\relax \leavevmode\\\relax (f) If \(\vec{F}(x,y) = 3 y \sin(xy) \vec{i} + 3 x \sin(xy)\vec{j}\), then \leavevmode\\\relax \(f(x,y)\) = \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}}
